oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Allen-White School: poster regarding arson
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lockridge, Inv. Jaron
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 100 Allen Extension Road, Whiteville, Hardeman Co., TN
Poster offering a reward for the arrest and conviction of person(s) involved in the burning of Allen-White School

The Allen-White School was built 1918-1920 with support of the Julius Rosenwald Fund. When the school closed, the building was acquired by a non-profit organization associated with ElCanaan Missionary Baptist Church. The building then was destroyed by arson in May of 2012.

$7,500 reward Wanted Whiteville Police Department Information leading to the arrest and conviction of the person(s) involved in the intentional burning of the historic Allen-White school located in Whiteville If you have information concerning this incident, contact inv. Jaron Lockridge at (731) 438-0465 or by email at tips@townofwhiteville.com
